text: læa phwk khea klaw wa brrda kar srrseriy thangmwl pen khx ngxallxhˌ phu sung di thahı sayya khxng phraxngkh pen thi smcring kæ phwk rea læa thrng thahı rea di khrxbkhrxng phændin nı swn swrrkh pheux thi rea ca di phanak xyu tam thi rea prasngkh dangnan rangwal khxng brrda phu kratha khwam di chang yxd yeiym thæ «
